thread.title: London & Partners PwC's UK hotels forecast 2016Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: London & Partners PwC's UK hotels forecast 2016Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: London & Partners PwC's UK hotels forecast 2016Travelandtourworld.com
text:
London & Partners PwC’s UK hotels forecast 2016 Published on : Saturday, September 26, 2015
In response to PwC’s UK hotels forecast to 2016 launched today, revealing that London hotel occupancy is forecast for a decade high, reaching 84% in 2015 with the Rugby World Cup providing a boost:
Chris Gottlieb, Chief Marketing and Communications Officer at London & Partners, the Mayor’s promotional company for the city, said; “We have seen record international visitor numbers over the last couple of years, with London consistently named the most popular destination in the world. It is fantastic news that those increasing visitor numbers have been reflected in record occupancy levels across the city’s hotels.”
“London continues to remain a world leading destination in an ever-increasingly competitive destination global marketplace. We’re thrilled that the city’s hotels are reaping the benefits of record tourists coming to the capital to experience its world-renowned history and heritage, along with its incredible cultural programme and an unbeatable variety of accommodation types to choose from.”
Source:- London & Partners
